statements.select: SELECT AA.CODE , AA.NAME , AA.NAME AS LIST_NAME FROM UAA.CODES AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.PARENT_CODE = #PARENT_CODE# ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ, AA.NAME ASC
SELECT AA.CODE , AA.NAME , AA.NAME AS LIST_NAME FROM UAA.CODES AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.PARENT_CODE IS NULL ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ, AA.NAME ASC

WITH MenusCTE (id, name, path, pid, hier_id, level) AS ( SELECT AA.MenuId as id , AA.MenuName as name , convert(varchar(1000), AA.MenuName) as path , AA.ParentMenuId as pid , convert(varchar(1000), right('000000' + convert(varchar, AA.SortSeq), 6)) as hier_Id , 1 as level FROM Menus aa WHERE AA.ParentMenuId IS NULL AND AA.UseYn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT AA.MenuId as id , AA.MenuName as name , convert(varchar(1000), bb.name + ' ▶ ' + AA.MenuName) as path , AA.ParentMenuId as pid , convert(varchar(1000), bb.hier_id + '-' + right('000000'+convert(varchar, AA.SortSeq), 6)) as hier_id , bb.level + 1 as level FROM Menus aa INNER JOIN MenusCTE bb on AA.ParentMenuId = bb.id WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT AA.id as CODE , AA.path as NAME , replicate(' ', (AA.level -1) * 5) + '▶' + AA.name as LIST_NAME FROM MenusCTE aa ORDER BY AA.hier_id ASC
SELECT AA.CODE AS CODE , AA.NAME AS NAME , AA.NAME AS LIST_NAME FROM UAA.CODES AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PARENT_CODE IS NULL ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ, AA.NAME ASC

SELECT AA.CUSTOMER_ID , AA.CUSTOMER_NAME , BZ.BIZ_REG_NO , BZ.REP_NAME FROM UCD.CUSTOMERS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.BIZ_REG_CE BZ ON AA.BIZ_REG_ID = BZ.BIZ_REG_ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR BZ.BIZ_REG_NO = #FIND_TEXT# OR BZ.REP_NAME = #FIND_TEXT# OR BZ.BIZ_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' )
AND AA.USE_YN = #USE_YN#
ORDER BY AA.CUSTOMER_NAME ASC

SELECT AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.PRODUCT_CODE , ISNULL(M1.NAME, AA.UNIT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_UNIT FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON AA.UNIT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' WHERE 1=1 AND AA.PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('P','G')
AND ( AA.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.BARCODE = #FIND_TEXT# )
AND AA.USE_YN = #USE_YN#
ORDER BY AA.PRODUCT_NAME ASC

SELECT AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.PRODUCT_CODE , ISNULL(M1.NAME, AA.UNIT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_UNIT FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON AA.UNIT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' WHERE 1=1 AND AA.PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('P')
AND ( AA.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.BARCODE = #FIND_TEXT# )
AND AA.USE_YN = #USE_YN#
ORDER BY AA.PRODUCT_NAME ASC

SELECT ISNULL(M2.NAME, AA.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE , ISNULL(M3.NAME, AA.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY , AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.PRODUCT_CODE , ISNULL(M1.NAME, AA.UNIT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_UNIT FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON AA.UNIT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M2 ON AA.PRODUCT_TYPE = M2.CODE AND M2.PARENT_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M3 ON AA.CATEGORY = M3.CODE AND M3.PARENT_CODE = 'CATEGORY' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.BARCODE = #FIND_TEXT# )
AND AA.USE_YN = #USE_YN#
ORDER BY ISNULL(M2.SORT_SEQ, 99999), AA.PRODUCT_TYPE, ISNULL(M3.SORT_SEQ, 99999), AA.CATEGORY, AA.PRODUCT_NAME ASC

SELECT AA.PRODUCT_ID AS MATERIAL_ID , AA.PRODUCT_NAME AS MATERIAL_NAME , M1.NAME AS UNIT_TYPE FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON AA.UNIT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' WHERE 1=1 AND AA.PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('M')
AND ( AA.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' )
AND AA.USE_YN = #USE_YN#
ORDER BY AA.PRODUCT_NAME ASC

SELECT AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.PRODUCT_CODE , ISNULL(M1.NAME, AA.UNIT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_UNIT , ISNULL(M2.NAME, AA.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON AA.UNIT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M2 ON AA.PRODUCT_TYPE = M2.CODE AND M2.PARENT_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' WHERE 1=1 AND AA.PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('M','G')
AND ( AA.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.BARCODE = #FIND_TEXT# )
AND AA.USE_YN = #USE_YN#
ORDER BY ISNULL(M2.SORT_SEQ, 99999), AA.PRODUCT_TYPE, AA.PRODUCT_NAME ASC
